And <S%G1161><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> we be afflicted, <S%G2346><s%> it is for <S%G5228><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> consolation <S%G3874><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> salvation, <S%G4991><s%> which is effectual <S%G1754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the enduring <S%G5281><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> sufferings <S%G3804><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> suffer: <S%G3958><s%> or whether <S%G1535><s%> we be comforted, <S%G3870><s%> it is for <S%G5228><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> consolation <S%G3874><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> salvation. <S%G4991><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we would <S%G2309><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> have you ignorant <S%G50><s%> <S%G5209><s%> of <S%G5228><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> trouble <S%G2347><s%> which came <S%G1096><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Asia, <S%G773><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we were pressed <S%G916><s%> out of measure, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5236><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> strength, <S%G1411><s%> insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> despaired <S%G1820><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> of life: <S%G2198><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> we <S%G848><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sentence <S%G610><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we should <S%G5600><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> trust <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> which raiseth <S%G1453><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dead: <S%G3498><s%>

Ye <S%G5216><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> helping together <S%G4943><s%> by prayer <S%G1162><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> for the gift <S%G5486><s%> bestowed upon <S%G1519><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> by the means of <S%G1537><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> persons <S%G4383><s%> thanks may be given <S%G2168><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> on our behalf. <S%G5228><s%> <S%G2257><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> rejoicing <S%G2746><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> testimony <S%G3142><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> conscience, <S%G4893><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> simplicity <S%G572><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> godly <S%G2316><s%> sincerity, <S%G1505><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> fleshly <S%G4559><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> but <S%G235><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> we have had our conversation <S%G390><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> more abundantly <S%G4056><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you-ward. <S%G5209><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we write <S%G1125><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> other things <S%G243><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> than <S%G235><s%> <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> ye read <S%G314><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G2532><s%> acknowledge; <S%G1921><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> I trust <S%G1679><s%> ye shall <S%G3754><s%> acknowledge <S%G1921><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> the end; <S%G5056><s%>

As <S%G2531><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> ye have acknowledged <S%G1921><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> in <S%G575><s%> part, <S%G3313><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> rejoicing, <S%G2745><s%> even as <S%G2509><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> are ours <S%G2257><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> in this <S%G5026><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> I was minded <S%G1014><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> before, <S%G4386><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye might have <S%G2192><s%> a second <S%G1208><s%> benefit; <S%G5485><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> to pass <S%G1330><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> to be brought on my way <S%G4311><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> Judea. <S%G2449><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G3745><s%> the promises <S%G1860><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> are <S%G3588><s%> yea, <S%G3483><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Amen, <S%G281><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> us. <S%G2257><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> he which establisheth <S%G950><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hath anointed <S%G5548><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%> is God; <S%G2316><s%>

Who hath also sealed <S%G4972><s%> <S%G2532><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> given <S%G1325><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earnest <S%G728><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hearts. <S%G2588><s%>
